disease: Malignant neoplasm of scapula and long bones of unspecified upper limb

symptoms.name: Pain
symptoms.pattern: Can be present or absent; may be severe depending on the cancer's progression and bone involvement.

symptoms.name: Bone fracture
symptoms.pattern: Can occur due to weakening of the bone by the tumor.

symptoms.name: General malaise
symptoms.pattern: Can range from mild weakness to severe illness, depending on the cancer's progression.

required: Presence of malignant neoplasm in the scapula or long bones of the upper limb confirmed by biopsy or imaging.
